Projector.H

00001 #ifndef PROJECTOR_H
00002 #define PROJECTOR_H
00003 
00007 template <unsigned D, unsigned D_> class Projector: protected Projector<D-1, D_> {
00008     public:
00010         std::vector<VecMath::Vector<D_> > operator()(
00011                 const std::vector<VecMath::Vector<D> > &x,
00012                 double scrW, double camW) {
00013             if (D_ > D) {
00014                 throw std::logic_error("Tried to project to a higher dimension");
00015             }
00016             if (D_ == D) {
00017                 throw std::logic_error("Explicit specialization should be called");
00018             }
00019             if (camW <= scrW) {
00020                 throw std::logic_error("Screen must be closer to object than eye");
00021             }
00022 
00023             std::vector<VecMath::Vector<D-1> > x_proj(x.size());
00024 
00025             for (unsigned i = 0; i < x.size(); i++) {
00026                 double ProjectionFactor = (scrW-camW)/(x[i][D-1]-camW);
00027 
00028                 for (unsigned j = 0; j < D-1; j++)
00029                     x_proj.at(i)[j] = ProjectionFactor*x[i][j];
00030             }
00031             return Projector<D-1, D_>::operator()(x_proj, scrW, camW);
00032         }
00033 };
00034 
00036 template <unsigned D> class Projector<D, D> {
00037     public:
00039         std::vector<VecMath::Vector<D> > operator()(
00040             const std::vector<VecMath::Vector<D> > &x, double, double) {
00041             return x;
00042         }
00043 };
00044 
00045 #endif
